name: Out of Fuel (Amber Studios)
description:
Plot

Before the events of the game, a boy has run out of fuel during a jetpack flight to his home city, crash-landing in a forest. He must use any fuel he can find to traverse the landscape and return home!

How to Play

Instructions are provided in-game for keyboard control.
If you would like to use a controller:
- Use the left stick to move left and right
- Use the shoulder buttons to hop
- Use Y (Xbox), X (Nintendo), or △ (PlayStation) to sprint
- Use B (Xbox), A (Nintendo), or ◯ (PlayStation) to fly

Note: The game is unfinished -- some graphics are not final, and there are only four levels.

Developed by 5 members of the Amber Studios team for GoGodotJam 2:
- @lisa_wolfgang, programmer / sound designer / level designer
- @MasterG, programmer / level designer
- @SpiceyWolf, pixel artist
- @JustJade, designer
- @Samrya, composer

We created everything with the exception of the following external assets:
- Serif Pixel-7 (font) by Sizenko Alexander
- Press Start 2P (font) by Cody Boisclair
- The Godot game engine
